question: Buddhacharita, the epic biography of Gautama Buddha in Sanskrit was written by__:
explanation: The Buddha Charita was the biography of Buddha which was penned by Ashvaghosa probably in the first century C.E. He was a renowned Sanskrit poet. The Buddha Charita is made up of 28 songs recounting events in Shakyamuni Buddhaâ€™s life up to the time of his great awakening.
